name: Bernal Heights Neighborhood Center
description: Bernal Heights Neighborhood Center (BHNC) works to preserve and enhance the ethnic, cultural, and economic diversity of Bernal Heights and surrounding neighborhoods. They promote action to build a just and equitable community for all. BHNC focuses on the needs of people with low and moderate incomes.
